issue.title: Rendering errors when running headless on remote machine

content.raw:
I understand that OGRE has to run for the sensors. The problem was that it was trying to launch an X display on the remote server and couldn’t, and that was what was crashing the container. Adding a virtual display with xvfb prevents this.  

I would like to leave this issue open until I can check everything runs with docker-compose on the remote system. Or I can make a new issue for any additional problems I encounter with that, if you prefer.  Up to you.
